item.title: Finally! A President Stands Tall
item.description: They were dumbfounded. Those United Nations stuffed shirts were dumbfounded. Struck dumb. Silenced. Shocked. Floored. Those sissy diplomats were shaken. Appalled. Frightened. Never in the sordid history of the United Nations has an American president spoken in unvarnished truth in unvarnished terms. Trump has the best words. Trump used his best words today. The best of the best. Trump called Kim Jung Un “Rocket Man.” The funniest and most effective linguistic kill-shot to date.
